channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Drew Brees’s Fast-Food Chain Could Be the Next Raising Cane’s
item.description: The menu features one thing. And business is booming.

item.title: This Emergency Software Company Just Became the Newest Unicorn Following a $100 Million Fundraise
item.description: Here’s how emergency detection company RapidSOS became an indispensable service for first responders.

item.title: Larry Ellison and Oracle Won 2025 — but at What Cost?

item.title: If Your Employees Are Taking On Second Jobs, Here’s How to Handle It
item.description: Economic realities are forcing many people who already have a full-time job to take on extra work.

item.title: Creators Are the New Workforce. They’re Burning Out Without Support
item.description: When your business depends on you showing up every day, burnout isn’t just possible—it’s inevitable.

item.title: Gustav Klimt portrait breaks modern art record with $236 million sale
